questions.question: This British overseas territory is a popular tax haven.
The highest point on this island, Mount Obama was renamed in 2009 in honor of the president.
This country produces its water from a desalination plant and the electricity on the island is a by-product of the desalination process.
This country has a magnificent underwater cave system.
This is the island of Cou-Cou and Flying Fish. The popular R&B singer Rihanna is from here.
Rum is the national drink of this country. The fastest man in the world Usain Bolt is from here.
questions.optionB: B. Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
